H0.text: Atmosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H1.text: Hydrosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H2.text: Lithosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H3.text: Hemisphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

A4.text: An atmosphere is a layer of gases that envelop an astronomical object, held in place by the gravity of the object.
